problem_text_cn: 如图,已知O是四边形ABCD内一点,OA=OB=OC,∠ABC=∠ADC=65°,则∠DAO+∠DCO=()
problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, it is known that O is a point in the quadrilateral ABCD, OA = OB = OC, ∠ABC = ∠ADC = N_0, then ∠DAO + ∠DCO = ()
raw_comment: 本题考查了等腰三角形的性质,四边形的内角和定理,圆周角定理等知识点,能求出∠ABO+∠OBC=∠BAO+∠BCO=65°是解此题的关键．
